metadata.title: Using external memory with the RA8 Series MCUs

sections.content:
Question:
What memory options do the RA8 Series MCUs support for demanding applications with larger memory needs?
Answer:
RA8M1:
To support the diverse and demanding application needs, the RA8M1 Group MCUs support multiple internal and external memory options and interfaces including -
2MB embedded flash and 1MB SRAM with ECC/parity protection.
Larger SRAM 1MB (384KB w/ ECC, 128KB TCM w/ ECC, 512KB parity) for graphics and data logging use cases.
xSPI compliant Octal SPI memory interface with Execute-In-Place and Decryption-on-the-fly, which can be used in Octal, Quad or single SPI mode to access memory sizes up to 512MB. Two memory devices can be attached to the XSPI interface using chip selects.
32bit external memory bus for access of up to 128MB external NOR flash or SDRAM memory.
RA8D1:
To support high resolution graphics/HMI application, the RA8D1 Group MCUs support multiple internal and external memory options and interfaces including -
2MB embedded flash that can be used for code as well as storage of graphics assets.
Larger SRAM 1MB (384KB w/ ECC, 128KB TCM w/ ECC, 512KB parity) that can be used to store graphics frame buffers for lower resolution displays (up to WVGA)
32bit SDRAM interface that is most typically used in graphics applications to store larger single or dual frame buffers.external memory bus for access of up to 128MB external NOR flash or SDRAM memory.
xSPI compliant Octal SPI memory interface with Execute-In-Place and Decryption-on-the-fly, which can be used for storage of graphics assets or code. This interface can be used in Octal, Quad mode to access memory sizes up to 512MB. Two memory devices can be attached to the XSPI interface using chip selects. 
RA8T1:
To support the diverse and demanding application needs, the RA8T1 Group MCUs support multiple internal and external memory options and interfaces including -
2MB or 1MB embedded flash with ual-bank function
1MB SRAM (384KB w/ ECC, 128KB TCM w/ ECC, 512KB parity)
12KB Data Flash
1KB Standby SRAM
32-bit External bus/SDRAM interface enable to access up to 128MB external NOR flash or SDRAM memory.
Suitable Products
RA8M1, RA8D1, RA8T1
